aguavberry.desc: Restores 1/8 max HP at 1/2 max HP or less; confuses if -SpD Nature. Single use.

bigroot.desc: Holder gains 1.3x HP from draining moves, Aqua Ring, Ingrain, and Leech Seed.

energypowder.name: Energy Powder
energypowder.desc: Restores 50 HP to one Pokemon but lowers Happiness.

figyberry.desc: Restores 1/8 max HP at 1/2 max HP or less; confuses if -Atk Nature. Single use.

iapapaberry.desc: Restores 1/8 max HP at 1/2 max HP or less; confuses if -Def Nature. Single use.

lightclay.desc: Holder's use of Light Screen or Reflect lasts 8 turns instead of 5.

magoberry.desc: Restores 1/8 max HP at 1/2 max HP or less; confuses if -Spe Nature. Single use.

souldew.desc: If held by a Latias or a Latios, its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def are 1.5x.

wikiberry.desc: Restores 1/8 max HP at 1/2 max HP or less; confuses if -SpA Nature. Single use.
